name: Crappy Connection
description:
Crappy Connection is a simple puzzle platformer in which you are linked together with another robot, and the goal is to complete a simple objective - get each character to their goal.

A familiar concept to be sure, but your robot friend is lagging a bit. It's alright, I'm sure you'll figure out a way to get to the goal anyway! Perhaps you might even be able to take advantage of that fact through the many chambers of the lab.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, with the theme being "Joined Together".

Everything here was made by my friends and I.

Programming, level design, and most other assets - 1nkFalcon#8849

Music - chenchar#1234

Thanks for playing!
